page.title: 21Linfield at 125!
page.content:
At the time of writing we are about to enter our 125th year!

As the season ended, we finished with the Irish Premier League and Irish Cup.. our 5th League and Cup double in 6 years!

Windsor Park is to be refurbished, with the Railway Stand gone, and the South Stand about to go soon, to be replaced with new Stands, and bring it up to date. Windsor Park is still the home of the Irish Football Association, and still belongs to Linfield.

So.. we are now at 50 league titles, and 41 Irish Cup wins, and in keeping with the technological advances since this original project, we have our own website...
Leviathan
